Description.Text: Club Quarters, Lincoln's Inn Fields is located at Lincoln's Inn Fields, close to Chancery Lane and Holborn and near the Royal Opera House, Covent Garden, theater district, shops and restaurants. The hotel has unique features including an outdoor terrace offering dining and bar service throughout the day. Adjacent to the terrace is the Club Living Room with social networking and business center areas. Standard guestrooms have an "activity center" designed for working, dining, or relaxing, incorporating the latest in-room technology. Like all Club Quarters, most services are complimentary: high-speed Internet access, business center, printing, purified bottled water, coffee/tea, newspapers, fitness room and exercise equipment delivered to the guestroom. The other amenities include dry cleaning, lobby and reception.
Club Quarters, Lincoln's Inn Fields is located at Lincoln's Inn Fields, close to Chancery Lane and Holborn and near the Royal Opera House, Covent Garden, theater district, shops and restaurants.

Small Double Room - One queen bed with premium bedding and linens. Other features include contemporary furnishings - latest design workstation with task lighting, ergonomic chair and complimentary high-speed Internet access with network printing, flat screen LCD TV with cable/satellite, Pay-Per-View, 2-line speaker and cordless phones with direct dial number and voicemail, alarm clock radio with iPod docking station, individual climate control, hair dryer, makeup/shaving mirror and tea/coffee making facilities. Maximum Occupancy: 2
Standard Room - One queen bed with premium bedding and linens. Other features include contemporary furnishings - latest design workstation with task lighting, ergonomic chair and complimentary high-speed Internet access with network printing, flat screen LCD TV with cable/satellite, Pay-Per-View, 2-line speaker and cordless phones with direct dial number and voicemail, alarm clock with iPod docking station, individual climate control, hair dryer, makeup/shaving mirror and tea/coffee making facilities. Maximum Occupancy: 2
Superior Room - Oversized room with one queen bed, microwave and refrigerator. Other features include premium bedding and linens, contemporary furnishings - latest design workstation with task lighting, ergonomic chair and complimentary high-speed Internet access with network printing, flat screen LCD TV with cable/satellite, Pay-Per-View, 2-line speaker and cordless phones with direct dial number and voicemail, alarm clock with iPod docking station, individual climate control, hair dryer, makeup/shaving mirror and tea/coffee making facilities. Some rooms may accommodate a rollaway - available only upon request and subject to availability. Maximum Occupancy: 3
One Room Suite with Kitchenette - One queen bed with kitchenette, including microwave and refrigerator. Other features include sofa bed, premium mattress and linens, contemporary wood furnishings - latest design workstation with task lighting, ergonomic chair and complimentary high-speed Internet access with network printing, cable/satellite TV with On Demand movies, 2-line speaker and cordless phones with direct dial number and voicemail, alarm clock with iPod docking station, individual climate control, hair dryer, makeup/shaving mirror and tea/coffee making facilities. Some rooms may accommodate a chairbed or rollaway -available only upon request and subject to availability
